title: (x) Number 7 on Vegas slot machines - custom designed {Thomas}
content:
Can someone please tell me what font the "7" is on the slot machine and where I can download that font?

Thanks,

Matt

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [777 slots.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133134/http:/typophile.com/files/777%20slots.jpg) | 4.69 KB |
author: Filmkid2003

comments.content:
What makes you think it's a font? It is most likely designed by itself, like a logo or the other pictures. It would also vary from one slot machine manufacturer to another.

It's possible that somebody has since put one of these into a font imitating the original design, but I haven't seen it.

Regards,

T

I agree with Thomas, this is more than likely hand-lettered. But, if you wait until morning the gurus can probably point you toward something similar. In the meantime you could check out Letterhead fonts -- [www.letterheadfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133134/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "www.letterheadfonts.com") -- they have some great western styles.

Thread closed --\> [http://typophile.com/node/20791](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133134/http:/typophile.com/node/20791 "http://typophile.com/node/20791")
